snippet: Corinthian Colleges, under an agreement with the Education Department, will sell almost 100 schools in the United States and Canada, and it will close a dozen others.
abstract: Corinthian Colleges, one of the largest for-profit operators of trade schools and colleges, will largely cease operating under agreement with the federal Education Department; college has been facing heavy losses and a crackdown by government agencies.
lead_paragraph: Corinthian Colleges, under an agreement with the Education Department, will sell almost 100 schools in the United States and Canada, and it will close a dozen others.

headline.main: College Group Run for Profit Looks to Close or Sell Schools
headline.print_headline: College Group Run for Profit Looks to Close or Sell Schools
